attributes.action: NAME & JAIL SELF EMPLOYED NON PAYING PARENTS
attributes.additional_details:
Self-employed and non paying parents are still not being held accountable for their lack to no payments for the absent parent.

Self-employed are being pretty much let off the hook because they just give up work and can get cash in hand, threats of bank & wage arrested and removal of cars and other value, rare to never happens.

I want to see jail sentences happen, and for them to still pay there outstanding debt, the lackluster parent is allowed to do as they please and are never held accountable - we need to do it like America jail them and still make them pay.
